description: A look back at the collective of rebel Italian students who defined the radical architecture movement of the ’60s and ’70s but never completed a single building.
title: The Mad Genius of Superstudio
title_page: The Mad Genius of Superstudio - The New York Times
text:
The Mad Genius of Superstudio
A look back at the collective of rebel Italian students who defined the radical architecture movement of the ’60s and ’70s but never completed a single building.
